recipes.title: Yubashiri
lines: §lYubashiri§r was one of the fifty Ryo Wazamono grade swords. Roronoa Zoro obtained this sword for free from a sword shop owner.

recipes.title: Terry Sword
lines: The §lTerry Sword§r is a gigantic longsword wielded by Dorry. It shattered during his and Brogy's assault on the Island Eater.
